introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: AI Magellan is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

information_collection.title: Information We Collect
information_collection.personal_info: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, submit a website, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, and any content you submit.
information_collection.usage_data: We automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our services, including IP address, browser type, operating system, pages visited, and time spent on our site.
information_collection.cookies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and analyze usage patterns on our website.

information_use.title: How We Use Your Information
information_use.service_provision: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
information_use.communication: To communicate with you about your account and our services
information_use.personalization: To personalize your experience and provide relevant content
information_use.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve our website functionality
information_use.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
information_sharing.third_parties: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
information_sharing.service_providers: We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, provided they agree to keep this information confidential.
information_sharing.legal_compliance: We may disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of others.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.measures: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
data_security.limitations: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

user_rights.title: Your Rights
user_rights.access: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information
user_rights.opt_out: You can opt out of receiving promotional communications from us
user_rights.cookies_control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences
